path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Formacar Token - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Mismatched Quantity Confirm in `AllowLaunchMarket`
findings.description: The number of quantity confirm in document is 2, but in the source code, it is defined by 3.

findings.title: `feeReceiver` can miss the `LowMarketFeeTemps`
findings.description: The governance contract uses `_lowFeePair` state to store the latest pair that wants to update market fees. However, if the governance triggers to update another pair, the `feeReceiver` can't accept the old pair anymore.
